title: (x) Frank Wilczek "The Lightness of Being" book cover - FF Absara, FF Sanuk {Paolo Mazzetti}
content:
Hi all,

Can you help me identify the italic text on this cover? Thanks!

comments.content: [FF Absara Thin Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090857/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_absara_tf_thin_italic/?&sample_text=Big%20Questions%20Frank%20Wilczek) and the other is [FF Sanuk](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202090857/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/fontfont/ff_sanuk_ot_thin/?&sample_text=LIGHTNESS%20BEING&sample_size=48), both by Xavier Dupr√©.
